cloud-backup.exclude:
# Built application files *.apk *.apks
# Files for the Gradle Wrapper gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.jar gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.properties
# Local configuration file (SDK path, etc.) local.properties
# Android Studio generated files .idea/
# Compiled output and temporary files build/ *.log *.tmp *.bak
# OS-specific files .DS_Store Thumbs.db
# Generated module files *.iml
# User-specific files /.gradle/ /captures/
